text: Manuel Carlos Valls (, born 13 August 1962) is a Spanish-born French politician. He became the Prime Minister of France on 31 March 2014. Valls was born in Barcelona to a Swiss mother and Spanish painter Xavier Valls. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:French mayors Category:Prime ministers of France Category:Government ministers of France Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Politicians from Barcelona
title: Manuel Valls
